00040 #ifndef POINT3D_H
00041 #define POINT3D_H

00043 #include <iostream>
00044 struct Vector3D;
00045 
00046 struct Point3D
00047 {
00048     Point3D( double dx = 0.0, double dy = 0.0, double dz = 0.0 );
00049     explicit Point3D ( const Vector3D& vector );
00050     ~Point3D( );
00051 
00052     Point3D& operator+=( const Vector3D& vector );
00053     Point3D operator+( const Vector3D& vector ) const;
00054     Point3D& operator-=( const Vector3D& vector );
00055     Point3D operator-( const Vector3D& vector ) const;
00056     Vector3D operator-( const Point3D& point ) const;
00057 
00058     Point3D& operator*=( double scalar );
00059     Point3D operator*( double scalar ) const;
00060     Point3D& operator/=( double scalar );
00061     Point3D operator/( double scalar ) const;
00062 
00063     bool operator==( const Point3D& point ) const;    
00064     bool operator!=( const Point3D& point ) const;
00065     double operator[]( int i ) const;
00066     double& operator[]( int i );
00067 
00068     double x;
00069     double y;
00070     double z;   
00071 };
00072
